creator: vladimir@bossicard.com
text:
The filers don't pass the already written tests. The tests make sure that all
work the same way with the same input values.

The HashFilter has not been totally fixed.  Since it has been deprecated, we
could simple delete it from the current cvs repository.

creator: vladimir@bossicard.com

some improvements to the filers
